00038 Pan::Pan(DynamicVariable& v)
00039     :panVar_(v.clone()) {}
00040     
00041 void Pan::set(DynamicVariable& v)
00042 {
00043     delete panVar_;
00044     panVar_ = v.clone();
00045 }
00046 
00047 Pan* Pan::clone()
00048 {
00049     return new Pan(*panVar_);
00050 }
00051 
00052 MultiTrack* Pan::spatialize(Track& t, int numTracks)
00053 {
00054    
00055     m_sample_count_type sampleCount = t.getWave().getSampleCount();
00056     m_rate_type samplingRate = t.getWave().getSamplingRate();
00057    
00058     // create an empty multi Track object:
00059     MultiTrack* mt = new MultiTrack(numTracks, sampleCount, samplingRate);
00060    
00061     // tell panVar_ this information.
00062     panVar_->setSamplingRate(samplingRate);
00063     panVar_->setDuration( float(sampleCount) / float(samplingRate));
00064     
00065     // get references to the input
00066     SoundSample& inWave = t.getWave();
00067     SoundSample& inAmp = t.getAmp();
00068 
00069 
00070     // for each channel:
00071     for (int c=0; c<numTracks; c++)
00072     {
00073         // get an iterator for the pan variable:
00074         Iterator<m_value_type> panIter = panVar_->valueIterator();
00075         
00076         // get references for this channel.
00077         SoundSample& thisWave = mt->get(c)->getWave();
00078         SoundSample& thisAmp = mt->get(c)->getAmp();
00079 
00080         // create a position value for this channel:
00081         m_value_type pos = float(c) / float(numTracks-1);
00082         
00083         // Iterate over each sample
00084         m_value_type scale;
00085         for (m_sample_count_type i=0; i<sampleCount; i++)
00086         {
00087             // calculate the scaling factor:
00088             scale = 1.0 - fabs(pos - panIter.next());
00089             if (scale > 1.0) scale = 1.0;
00090             if (scale < 0.0) scale = 0.0;
00091             
00092             thisWave[i] = scale * inWave[i];
00093             thisAmp[i] = scale * inAmp[i];
00094         }
00095     }
00096      
00097     // Retur the multitrack object
00098     return mt;
00099 }
